name: StericMassAction
description: Steric mass action isotherm for ion exchange chromatography

scalar_parameters.name: is_kinetic
scalar_parameters.description: Use kinetic binding (true) or rapid equilibrium (false)

scalar_parameters.name: reference_liquid_phase_conc
scalar_parameters.description: Reference liquid phase concentration for non-dimensionalization

scalar_parameters.name: reference_solid_phase_conc
scalar_parameters.description: Reference solid phase concentration for non-dimensionalization

component_parameters.name: characteristic_charge
component_parameters.description: Characteristic charge (nu) - number of binding sites occupied
